title: Why does Garen still have a silence?
body:
When {{champion:7}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:91}} got their remove?

Rito logic?

replies.body: Dash/Blink + burst damage + silence is the specific combinaiton we're removing. Garen doesn't have immediate reposition like those assassins, so we don't feel there's a problem with him having a silence as a result.

Finally after 5 long years, a red actually respond to my thread!

Can you give leblanc silence on her e proc?  So her snare if she land it give her silence and it would require skill to land it?  She has a very low winrate right now.
Finally get a reply, doesn't read what it says.
The other champions you listed are assassins. Assassins with silences are pretty much the definition of zero counter-play.
I can counter Leblanc with Lissandra though.
Not if Leblanc has a silence...
Garen's silence is the least broken thing about him, never has been and probably never will be.
Because Garen isn't a mobile assassin.
Because it's his only from of CC, is a fighter who doesn't 100-0 you before you can do anything, and needs to run all the way up to you in order to use it
Because he already has to close his gap (slowly) so if he manages to get his Q to hit someone he deserves to be able to do some amount of damage without them instantly dashing away.
But he also tanky compare to the three I listed above.

> [{quoted}](name=JARmates,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=e9zcE1Qh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-24T00:10:56.758+0000)
>
> But he also tanky compare to the three I listed above.

he also does way less damage and isnt classified a assassin. Hes a juggernaut easily kited and stuff but if he closes the gap can do some damage

I have no problem with the silence, I have problems with the fact they increased a lot the damage from his Q and the fact that if he catches you with 50% life no matter who you are no matter how tanky (8) just say my name, I'll be there in a hurry, you don't have to worry, cause baby is Demacia baby my love, Demacia baby (8), Demacia Dem-Dem-Demacia you.

{{champion:86}} De-Demacia
Why does silence work on champions who aren't using magic?
I don't get what your saying.  Talon doesn't use magic and his silence is gone.
Not who uses it, the person affected by it. Read again.
